rules.title: Rules
rules.text: <0>You have 15 seconds to answer</0><1>There are 3 answers to choose from</1><2>The complexity of the questions depends on the passion you have previously chosen for animated series</2><3>Minimum number of questions - 10</3><4>You only need to answer 70% of the questions to pass the test</4><5>The test can be retaken an unlimited number of times</5><6>Please don't cheat</6>

victory.Stone: You're great and that's a hard fact!
victory.Tanya: «From today you are no longer a pitiful insect!»

losing.Tokk: «Killing you is an act of mercy»

lazy.text: Test not ready. I'm doing something more interest *Change*

about-project.title: Project goals:
about-project.text: <0><0>Help people with "What to watch today?"</0><1>Practice in building websites</1></0>

question.title: You can offer question to multfilms what you watched before

multfilm.title: A simple cartoon suggestion form
multfilm.text: Please don't recommend any trash, of course, if it's not so trash that it's good

errors.unavailable: You can't offered, you need watch more cartoons

basement.bigText: To contact me, just search by nickname Gibloor in: Telegram, Discord, Steam, Twitch, Google  (At the time of writing text, for this keyword the first link - my twitch, before was and steam). And, of course, e-mail: gibloor@yandex.ru

conditions.1: To successfully complete the test, it is enough to watch the first 2 seasons
conditions.2: To successfully complete the test, you need to watch 5 seasons
conditions.3: You need to watch 5 seasons to pass the test

personal.title: Rick and Morty
personal.description: <0>Rick and Morty</0> is an animated series about the adventures of a duo: a genius, an alcoholic, and a lunatic on a universal scale - Rick and his stupid, naive and attached to his grandfather - Morty.

RickSanchez.name: Rick Sanchez
RickSanchez.description: <0>Rick</0> is the main character of this animated series, not a single episode can do without him. <2>Telling his backstory = spoilers, so we'll skip it.</2><3>From that what is revealed in the first episodes: he does not look for easy ways, and breaking the law is the norm for him.</3>

MortySmith.name: Morty Smith
MortySmith.description: <0>Morty</0> is a (probably) 14-year-old teenager. <2>Intellectually "gifted", kind (relatively) and a little anxious young man.</2><3>Morty is one one of the main components of Rick's adventures, as he talks about in one of the episodes.</3>

JerrySmith.name: Jerry Smith
JerrySmith.description: <0>Jerry</0> is the show's main woooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo the show head.<2>Jerry's "accomplishments" in brief:</2><3>1. Hiding in a secluded place while his wife is in danger (and more than once)</3><4>2. Seizes every opportunity to get rid of Rick</4><5>3. Begs his daughter for money</5>

SummerSmith.name: Summer Smith
SummerSmith.description: <0>Summer</0> - in the series, she appears as a representative of an ordinary teenager of her age. <2>Of course, this changes throughout the series, since it is impossible to remain a standard Earthling after adventures in the universe.</2>

BethSmith.name: Beth Smith
BethSmith.description: <0>Beth</0> is the family's breadwinner and Rick's daughter<

personal.description: <0>Inside Job</0> is an animated series about Reagan Ridley and her work at Cognito Inc, 51% not a bad company

Reagan.name: Reagan Ridley
Reagan.description: <0>Reagan</0> is a 40 year old gadget genius with poor communication skills<2>Reagan has dedicated her entire life to her work.</2>

Brett.name: Brett Hand
Brett.description: <0>Brett</0> is a mascot and the second head of the Reagan team. <2>Brett is not very competent, but he is good at connecting with people</2><3>Despite the previously stated skill, Brett has a very bad relationship with relatives and "friends" from college</3>
